CommentsContent: This purchase was a super bargain and I'm extremely satisfied with this transaction. The item I received (pack of 5 athletic shirts) was the correct size and colors I ordered. For that reason, I wanted to go on record to let you know that what you see in the pictures is what I received. The quality in terms of look and feel, and the material/stitching are substandard when compared to recognized name brands like Nike, Under Armour, etc., however that was something to be expected, considering how ridiculously affordable the 5-pack is ($27.99) relative to the better known alternatives. Be sure you do not expect the same quality material and feel from Nike or Adidas brand, otherwise you will be disappointed. I like the fact that these shirts I purchased are easy to mix and match with my regular gym wear because the colors are a conservative standard set which are unobtrusive and without any tags or conspicuous branding. I will basically wear them to the gym, as an athletic top when I go running, and occassionaly as a casual top (while they are still new) with jeans and sneakers.
